A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie. Whole scenes could’ve been left out. Nothing seemed to make sense. Story line was terrible. Characters were unlikeable. I am a huge star wars fan but I won’t be for long if this kind of crap continues. Thank god for Rogue One. This 8 makes me appreciate the phantom menace. I wanted to love the movie but now I’m struggling to find anything I liked about it. Even the scenes that should’ve been epic were destroyed by misplaced humor. It seemed like whoever wrote the script didn’t know what direction to take so didn’t go anywhere at all. I’m so disappointed.
